Line.MultilineString: You enter a large room. Sitting in the middle is a huge rat, wearing a glowing crown. Its eyes shine with a bestial intelligence as it stares at you.
This is the rat you have been sent here to slay.
The rat is too strong, you are forced to flee.
You slay the rat! Its enormous body collapses down, the glimmering crown rolling from its head. From within its body a powerful soul emerges and coalesces in you hands into a large crystal.

Item.Name: Life Crystal of the Swarm Lord

Line.MultilineString: You gather the crown and a large piece of its tail as proof of your victory and leave.
